name: Chicken Nugget Casino
description:
Chicken Nugget Casino you manage a small casino by saving up for slot machines and slowly expanding the scale of your operation.

controls: 

Open the build menu to build, close it again to interact with the casino.

When not in build mode, click the slot machines to extract profit.

There is a setting called Money Vision, which will change the colors of the game depending on your cash, with the goal of reaching 1 million dollars.

Made in >2 weeks for College.
